entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
